TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type TcpChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 TCP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的通道實作。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸郵件，跨越遠端界限 （例如，應用程式定義域上的電腦） 之間。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 類別是結合的功能與便利性類別類別和類別。The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後，它會還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外處理的訊息，您可以指定實作並透過所處理的所有訊息傳遞。To perform additional processing of messages, you can specify implementations of the and through which all messages processed by the are passed. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦執行 Windows 95/98/Me，伺服器不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設定遠端處理伺服器和其用戶端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 這個範例包含三個部分、 伺服器、 用戶端，以及伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件。The example contains three parts, a server, a client, and a remote object used by the server and the client. 下列程式碼範例會顯示伺服器：The following code example shows a server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示此伺服器的用戶端：The following code example shows a client for this server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示在伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件：The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/common.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/common.cs#20)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，只啟動用戶端通道，不啟動伺服器通道。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, activating only a client channel, and not a server channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會初始化為其預設值的所有欄位。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 如果使用預設建構函式，則通道只當做用戶端通道，並不會接聽任何通訊埠。If the default constructor is used, the channel functions only as a client channel, and does not listen on any ports. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 port) cil managed

param.name: port
param.span: 伺服器通道接聽的連接埠。

span.span: The port on which the server channel listens.

summary.span: 使用接聽指定之連接埠的伺服器通道，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a server channel that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要要求遠端處理系統選擇代表您已開啟連接埠，指定連接埠為 0 （零）。To request that the remoting system choose an open port on your behalf, specify port 0 (zero). 這會建立動態指派連接埠上接聽要求的執行個體。This will create a instance to listen for requests on the dynamically assigned port. 這通常是在用戶端，並確定接聽回呼方法。This is typically done on the client to make sure that a is listening for callback methods. 如果 0 傳遞至建構函式具現化使用可用的連接埠。If 0 is passed to the constructor the is instantiated to use a free port. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following code example demonstrates using this method. 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，設定`port`參數為零。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to zero. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/VB/server.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，指定用戶端和伺服器通道要使用的組態屬性值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 用戶端通道要使用的 實作。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 伺服器通道要使用的 實作。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的組態屬性和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦執行 Windows 95/98/Me，伺服器不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. 通道接收提供外掛程式點，以允許存取基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用的傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收也負責的傳輸用戶端與伺服器之間的訊息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收鏈結中連結在一起，並且所有通道流經此鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`clientSinkProvider`並`serverSinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CS/server.cs#1)]

A that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 若要設定屬性中，指派為"name"值編製索引的屬性，傳遞至字典中的建構函式。To set the property, assign the value to the "name" indexed property in the dictionary passed to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example shows how to use this property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#3)]

span.span: The URL to which the new sink should deliver messages.
Can be .

param.span: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收 (Sink) 應該傳遞訊息給該遠端主機。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink should deliver messages.

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回通道訊息接收傳遞訊息給其中一個指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收器做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 請`url`或是`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 通道接收提供外掛程式點，以允許存取基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用的傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的連結在一起`ChannelSinkProviders`和所有通道流經此鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示目前通道開始接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫這個方法，以開始接聽新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用這個方法來重新啟動之後在通道上接聽已呼叫方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`參數可以用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 選擇性的通道狀態資訊。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示目前通道停止接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`參數可以用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
